title: SU FROM SO (KANNADA WITH ENGLISH SUBTITLE) (UA 16+)
F1 THE MOVIE
overview: Racing legend Sonny Hayes is coaxed out of retirement to lead a struggling Formula 1 team—and mentor a young hotshot driver—while chasing one more chance at glory.

title: WEAPONS (ENGLISH) (A)
overview: When all but one child from the same class mysteriously vanish on the same night at exactly the same time, a community is left questioning who or what is behind their disappearance.
tagline: Last night at 2:17 AM, every child from Mrs. Gandy's class woke up, got out of bed, went downstairs, opened the front door, walked into the dark ...and they never came back.

title: SAIYAARA (HINDI) (UA 16+)
overview: Short-tempered musician Krish is paired with a no-nonsense lyricist in Vaani, for the music company to work together. The sparks fly and Krish and Vaani get close and so much that they didn't anticipate. Will their love story stand the test of time, egos, and, more importantly, become bigger than themselves?

title: SON OF SARDAAR 2 (HINDI DTSX WITH ENGLISH SUBTITLE) (UA 13+)
THE FANTASTIC FOUR: FIRST STEPS
overview: Against the vibrant backdrop of a 1960s-inspired, retro-futuristic world, Marvel's First Family is forced to balance their roles as heroes with the strength of their family bond, while defending Earth from a ravenous space god called Galactus and his enigmatic Herald, Silver Surfer.

title: DHADAK 2
overview: The film explores barriers of class and status stitched in the minds of societies, underscoring a narrative of love that can never be fulfilled. Or can it?
tagline: When injustice becomes law, resistance becomes duty.

title: TOGETHER (ENGLISH) (A)
overview: Years into their relationship, a couple find themselves at a crossroads as they move to the country, abandoning all that is familiar in their lives except each other. With tensions already flaring, a nightmarish encounter with a mysterious, unnatural force threatens to corrupt their lives, their love, and their flesh.

title: NEW YORK (HINDI) (U/A)
overview: New York is a contemporary story of friendship set against the larger than life backdrop of a city often described as the centre of the world. Omar has gone abroad for the first time in his life and soon enough he begins to see and love America through the eyes of his American friends - Sam and Maya. It is the story of these three friends discovering a new world together.
tagline: Three friends ready to face the world... and then the world changed.

title: BUNTY AUR BABLI (HINDI) (U/A)
overview: Bunty and Babli are two young people who randomly meet each other after running away from their homes to chase their dream.  After facing hurdles in their path they decide to take up conning and soon become the best con artists in the country. However, their success is threatened as a relentless cop is on their trail.

title: MOHABBATEIN (HINDI) (U)
overview: At a prestigious all-male university, three friends seek love outside of the school grounds; at the same time, a newly-hired music teacher seeks to befriend and loosen up the militantly strict headmaster.

title: Anjaana Anjaani (U/A)
overview: Akash and Kiara are trying to find luck in their life after several failed attempts to be successful in their careers and in love. Fed up, they both decide to commit suicide by jumping off a bridge. However, both land up on the same bridge at the same time.
tagline: All the greatest love stories... are between strangers.

title: THE SABARMATI REPORT (HINDI) (U/A)
overview: A riveting journey into the 2002 incident that left an indelible mark on the entire nation.
tagline: Witness the brutal truth of the most controversial events.

title: DEADPOOL AND WOLVERINE (ENGLISH) (A)
overview: A listless Wade Wilson toils away in civilian life with his days as the morally flexible mercenary, Deadpool, behind him. But when his homeworld faces an existential threat, Wade must reluctantly suit-up again with an even more reluctant Wolverine.

title: JAB WE MET (HINDI) (U)
overview: A depressed wealthy businessman and a spunky and care-free young woman embark on an unexpected journey that changes their lives.
